name: WildPlanet(AnimalSoundLibrary|500+Animals)
0:
”Alexa, open Wild Planet”
”Alexa, play Tiger Sound from Wild Planet”
”Alexa, play Puppy Sound from Wild Planet”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wild planet
des:
Welcome to the Wild Planet, come learn the sounds your favourite animals make in the wild in their natural habitat! Inside the Wild Plant skill, there are over 500+ animals (listed below) that are very vocal and are waiting for you to give them a listen!

--------SOCIAL LINKS----------------
Follow Wild Planet on Instagram and Facebook @wildplanetskill
----------------------------------------

Wild Planet has almost all your favourite animals you want to hear, and more unique animals and specific breeds are being added constantly. If you're unable to find your favourite animal (or a specific breed), please let us know at howdy@oykuapp.com and we'll add them quickly!

+ Other 150 more Animals and specific breeds!


^^ All the above animals have 'Sound', Pictures, Scientific Name, Origin (native to) and an 'Interesting facts about them. *Pictures, Origin, and Facts by default can be viewed on any Display supported device like Echo Show, Fire TV, Alexa Mobile App, etc

To listen to an interesting fact about any animal, just say, "Alexa, Tell me a fact about Lion'
To know the scientific name of an animal, just say, "Alexa, what is the scientific name of the lion",

Feel free to reach us with questions, feedback, and suggestions: please write to howdy@oykuapp.com

Also, check out Story Stream Skill for Immersive Audio Stories narrated by real people (for age 16+), another skill from the Oyku Development House! :-)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
